      • guess

        public String guess(Character c)
        Description copied from interface: IHangman
        Receive a new user guess, and verify it against the secret word.
        Specified by:
        guess in interface IHangman
        Parameters:
        c - case insensitive user guess. If c is NULL then ignore it and do no change
        Returns:
        secret word with hidden characters (use ’-’ instead unsolved characters), or return NULL if user reached max wrong guesses
